title: PGIM div increases
text:
4)Previous 3)Next 66)Send 98)Actions 99)Translate News: News Story

08/26/2019 13:10:00[BUS]

PGIM High Yield Bond Fund, Inc. and PGIM Global High Yield Fund, Inc. declare an

increase in distributions for September, October and November 2019

Business Wire

NEWARK, N.J. -- August 26, 2019

PGIM High Yield Bond Fund, Inc. (NYSE:ISD) and PGIM Global High Yield Fund, Inc. (NYSE:GHY) declared

today that the funds will increase monthly distributions for September, October and November 2019.

This is the second time the funds have increased their respective monthly distributions within the last

six months. The distribution amounts and schedule for each fund appears below:

Change from

Distribution Prior

Fund Name Ticker Per Share Distribution

PGIM High Yield Bond Fund, Inc.

(formerly, PGIM Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc.) ISD $0.105 $0.005

PGIM Global High Yield Fund, Inc.

(formerly, PGIM Global Short Duration High Yield Fund, Inc.) GHY $0.105 $0.005

The increased distribution amounts result in a market price distribution rate of 8.81% for ISD and 8.94%

for GHY as of August 23, 2019.

Month Ex-Date Record Date Payable Date
